Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\newpa\\Downloads\\evidly-demo-final\\evidly-app-main" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix React hooks violation in Dashboard and add DemoWizard

Remove console.log and inline kitchen/facilities early returns that
occurred before useState calls, violating Rules of Hooks. Role-based
redirects now use KitchenDashboard/FacilitiesDashboard components
after all hooks have been called. Copy DemoWizard.tsx from .txt source.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\newpa\\Downloads\\evidly-demo-final\\evidly-app-main" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix 3 Dashboard issues: stat cards, tab filters, duplicate dropdown

1. Move TimeSavedCounter from Overview tab to Key Metrics tab only

- Replace Score History placeholder with Recharts LineChart using

- Add location filter dropdown to both Overview tab sections

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\newpa\\Downloads\\evidly-demo-final\\evidly-app-main" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add item IDs to navigation links and render real QR codes

- Action items now navigate with specific IDs \(e.g. /vendors?id=valley-fire\)
- Vendor rows navigate with vendor IDs
- QR Passport tab renders actual QRCodeSVG components encoding
  https://evidly-app.vercel.app/passport/[locationId] for each location

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
